item.title: Bangalore to Dharmasthala Solo Trip Plan
item.description: One or Two days Trip from Bangalore to Dharmasthala to Bangalore, If you are Solo riding on a MotorBike or You are a Family driving in Car, then this one or two days plan works very well. Below is the route mentioned where you can plan accordingly, if at all you need to spend some more time in some place in the list, you can skip the next place in the planned route. Dharmasthala is a small Hindu
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
